messages.name: CaBoomse
messages.message: Happy Birthday Moomers!  I rarely get to watch streams due to a night shift, but your goofiness and silly antics always make me smile when I do get to stop by.  Thank you for all your hardwork!  I look forward to your future projects!

messages.name: LastApocalypse
messages.message: I can't believe it's been another year! Thanks for all the streams and making my days more enjoyable. I hope you have another great year. See you in chat Moom!

messages.name: gandoulf
messages.message: happy birthday moon you help me having good day when i was feeling bad thank you very much from my hearth and again happy birthday

messages.name: Tanuki
messages.message:
To Mumei

You are my introduction to hololive and I’m so glad I found you. You’ve made everyone in this community happy, thank you for being you. Know that your enough and deserve the world!

messages.name: Schabonk
messages.message: Yesterday we moomed. Tomorrow we will be moomin but today we moom. Happy moomday

messages.name: Darkruler
messages.message: I will follow this religion of Mumei forever. You keep doing you. I will always support. Love your singing and art

messages.name: Asiko
messages.message: Happy Anniversary of Birth

messages.name: Yeti
messages.message: Happy Birthday Mumei! Thanks for the amazing and comfy streams! They always bring joy to my nights. I hope you have an amazing birthday this year!

messages.name: Jesus Alberto
messages.message: Happy Birthday Mumei. Thank you for all the hard work you put in every stream, song and event. You are the best IDOWL in the world and you are a Talented Owl (TOWL). You make me smile every single day :D

messages.name: waffling
messages.message: Happy Birthday Moom!!! I can't believe it's already been 3 years, it's been such an amazing time watching you achieve your dreams since your debut, and I can't wait to see how far you can go <3 also please give animol a pat

messages.name: AlphaCas
messages.message: Happy Birthday Mumei! I am happy to be able to celebrate your third birthday together with all Hoomans! Thank you for always being awesome and cute! You have created a great community for all Hoomans from all over the world, and I am glad to be a part of it. I wish you success and happiness. I will keep supporting you.

messages.name: 0btuse
messages.message: 3 years of Civilization and I can say I'm very proud of how far Mooms and the Hoomans have come! Its another Happy Birthday for our Guardian!

messages.name: Arahant
messages.message: Hi Mumei! Happy birthday! We wish everything goes well for you and don't forget that you have your friends and Hoomans who love you by your side. We're always rooting for you and loving you!!!

messages.name: RandomHooman12
messages.message: Happy Birthday Mumei! Wishing you endless joy and success! :D

messages.name: Nin-tan
messages.message: Looking forward to your east coast live appearance! There's so much stuff happening and I'm glad you're part of it. Happy Moomin' Birthday, you sweet owl gal!

messages.name: Lemon Quat
messages.message: Happy Birthday Moom! I hope you never forget how talented and appreciated you are! Your karaoke streams have never failed to cheer me up, and I'm sure others feel the same. I know you'll accomplish any goal you set your mind to, and I hope I can be there to cheer you on with a generous amount of emoji spam along the way!

messages.name: Novallis
messages.message: Happy Birthday Mumei! Your streams are always a blast and I love your goofy personality. I hope you have a great day, keep on moomin! :D

messages.name: Emi
messages.message: Ill do this later

messages.name: Zai
messages.message:
Happy birthday, Mumei!

Wishing you a day filled with all the happiness you deserve! Here's to many more birthdays and cherished moments together!

messages.name: heyitsuki
messages.message: Happy Birthday, Mumei! Your energy and positivity are truly inspiring. Wishing you a fantastic year ahead filled with joy and success!

messages.name: Proto
messages.message: I wish for your hard work to be rewarded. To my owlshi, happy birthday.

messages.name: Caveman
messages.message: Thank you for the excuses not to sleep. You are the best silly owl and can listen to you forever. Take care always.

messages.name: Guardian Angel
messages.message: Happy Birthday Mumei!!! Wishing you the best and hope that all your dreams come true! Me and the rest of the Hoomans are always here for you! :D

messages.name: Lightbearer Acolyte
messages.message: Happy birthday Mumei! Hope it's a moomin' one!

messages.name: HoiBoi
messages.message: Hey again mooms! Thanks for always being there to let me find some solace away from my hectic life. Truly, I love your content and the progress that you have made and I hope there is much more to come <3

messages.name: HoloTofu
messages.message: Happy Birthday Mumei! I've been a part of the community but this is my first time participating in one of these events! Thanks for the fun streams!

messages.name: Tava
messages.message: Happy Birthday, Mumei! I hope you have a fantastic day!

messages.name: Bjorn117
messages.message: Mumei!!! Happy Birthday! You are truly one of a kind and you always bring a smile to my face! I hope you have the best of days! Love from Mexico!

messages.name: KanashiiWolf
messages.message: Happy Birthday Moom! Thank you for another Moomin' year, awoo and ahoot to the next~ 🐺🦉

messages.name: Eva - ᚱᚷ
messages.message: oh hi, Mumei :D It is your birthday again! There have been some fun moments again this past year, milestones have been passed, and you accomplished so much! There is a lot to look forward to next year as well and I hope you will be happy and blessed. Say hi to Animal for me! 🤎

messages.name: Plagesama
messages.message: Hope you can treat yourself to something nice Mooms. Thanks for all the great mooms! Keep moomin on you silly billy owl! Happy Birthday Mumei!

messages.name: CorvusFall
messages.message: Happy Birthday Moom wishing you a beautiful day with overflowing happiness surrounded by loved ones. Cheers

messages.name: A message from me to you
messages.message:
I don't really watch your streams much but I still consider myself a fan, even though I don't really care about the model you use. The one I trully care for when watching your streams is the person behind that avatar. That being said I wish you spend your birthday surrounded with people you love and the people who love you back. And lastly I wish for you to live a long and fulfilling life without regret.

- Ian

messages.name: Jelly Beans
messages.message: Oh hi Moom! Happy birthday!!! You're the best owl, and we hoomans love you and will always love you~

messages.name: GeronKizan
messages.message: Maligayang kaarawan, Mumei! (HBD in Tagalog)  Your streams and singing inspires me to get through my toughest days as a struggling photographer.

messages.name: Sappysque
messages.message: Happy birthday Mumei!!!! Thank you for being so super awesome and I wish you nothing but happiness and health always! Yay!

messages.name: Hachie
messages.message: Hello Mumei hello hello whats up hello whats up oh hi whats up oh hi whats up happy birthday! Hope you have a good one and cheers to more birthdays!

messages.name: Sammy-Jack
messages.message: HBD Mumei! You're pretty cool, did you know that? Well, you probably knew that already, but I wanted to tell you. You're pretty cool. I hope you continue pursuing your passions knowing we all support you.

messages.name: CherryCola
messages.message: Happy birthday Moom! Your streams are always so much fun, I'm so happy to have such a cute owlshi! HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!

messages.name: HareKaze
messages.message: Happy BDay Mooms thank you very much for these great years and moments we have shared I wish you all the best.

messages.name: CONSU
messages.message:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY MUMEI!! IT'S BEEN THREE YEARS SINCE I'VE BEEN WATCHING YOU, BUT IT'S ALWAYS BEEN HAPPIER, FUNNIER, AND MORE ENTERTAINING EACH TIME PASSES. Sore wa watashi no imōtodesu

ENJOY YOUR DAY AND LIFE!!

messages.name: higanunni
messages.message: Happy birthday, Mumei <3 I hope you have a wonderful birthday. I am glad that you joined Hololive and made everyone day. I remember when Counsel got announced around 2021. And I fall in love with you. Your voice was soft and kind, and you have a fun personality that sticked out and I really enjoyed and loved that. Once again happy birthday and just know that everytime you fill down just know you have so much people that loves you just for you. Your irl self and Mumei all together! <3

messages.name: Toaster
messages.message: Happy Birthday Mumei, I love your content and music, it allows me to relax in times when I'm stressed. Have an amazing day and thank you!

messages.name: szy (Szymszus)
messages.message: happy birthday Mumei! even though i wasn't able to watch your streams, i still had fun watching clips

messages.name: Seta-kun
messages.message: Happy Birthday Mooms! Here's all the best for yet another year of mooming with civilization's cutest owl!

messages.name: Robz
messages.message: Happy day of entering existence in this funny world we live in! We're all confused and trying to process what it is we do here, but you've single handedly made it so much more fun and worth doing! Through all the struggles, travels, self improvement arcs and dealing with animal floof getting everywhere, thank you for everything you do to add some fun into everyone's life! You are an incredible being and everyone loves you very much! Thank you for being here and may you do everything you love to do :D

messages.name: Error 404 Name Not Found
messages.message: Hello Mumei! Thank you for the wonderful 4 YEARS you've spent with us! Here's to another 771 years full of smiles and silliness and ababababa!!!

messages.name: SleepyFenix
messages.message: Happy Birthday Mooms! One more year of moomin has gone by and makes way to a new one. Here's to many more years of moomin and may this new year of life let's you moom and be as silly as you want

messages.name: Kaede Nakamura
messages.message: Happy birthday to the one who brought us to civil modernity! Without you we could never have achieved things as great as creating aeroplanes, founding religions, and my favorite, becoming vtubers! You've given us so much to work with throughout time, Mumei, and I think it's time we give back (again!) Thank you!

messages.name: WriggleNB
messages.message:
Happy Birthday you silly owl! 

I'm happy to be a fan of you, and you helped me get through some deployments at sea, so thank you for being you! Never ever stop being you!

messages.name: JAR
messages.message: 3 Cheers for your Holo Birthday. Hip Hip Mumei! Thank you for the streams.

messages.name: Sensuifu
messages.message: Happy Birthday Moomers! May your special day be a hoot; and keep civilization in check by whatever means!
